Eygon of Carim.quest: If you kill Irina of Carim he will show up hostile.

Horace the Hushed.history: A companion to Anri of Astora in search of Aldritch.
Horace the Hushed.quest: After progressing to the Catacombs, he will be separated from Anri and later found at the bottom of Smouldering Lake. He will be hostile. If he is not killed here, he will later on kill Anri and put an end to her questline.

Sir Vilhelm.history: defender of sister friede in the painted world of ariendel
Sir Vilhelm.quest: You will meet him in the Cathedral. Here you must kill him to obtain a key in order to meet Sister Friede.

Solaire of Astora.history: Solaire is a Warrior of Sunlight on his own quest to link the flame. He is a strong knight who chose to become undead so that he could search for his own sun.
Solaire of Astora.items: White Sign Soapstone, Humanity x2, Sunlight Straight Sword, Sunlight Shield, Sunlight Talisman, Iron and Sun Set
Solaire of Astora.quest: You will first meet Solaire in the Undead Burg, at the opposite end of the bridge where the Hellkite Dragon sits. After speaking to him, he can then be found in Anor Londo at the bonfire after the silver knight archers.

Eygon of Carim.quest: If you kill Irina of Carim he will show up hostile.

Lonesome Galvan.history: Galvan is a lonely traveler willing to trade items for souls.
Lonesome Galvan.quest: You will first meet Galvan in a building full of Dark Stalkers.
